org.gravitechx.frc2018.utils.drivehelpers

Class DriveSignal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gravitechx.frc2018.utils.drivehelpers.DriveSignal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DifferentialDriveSignal, RotationalDriveSignal

    public abstract class DriveSignal
extends java.lang.Object
    Repersents an arbitrary drive signal.

      static double applyDeadband(double deadband, double signal)
      Introduces a deadband of a function given the signal.
      static double eliminateDeadband(double deadband, double signal)
      Eliminates the deadband of a function given the signal (deadband) This is needed if the stick's travel distance before actuation of the motor is too far.

      Get whether break mode is active.

      • limit

        public static double limit(double signal)
        Limits the signal to [-1, 1]. If it is out of bounds, uses 1 or -1.
        Parameters:
        signal -
        Returns:
        Limited value

      • eliminateDeadband

        public static double eliminateDeadband(double deadband,
                                       double signal)
        Eliminates the deadband of a function given the signal (deadband) This is needed if the stick's travel distance before actuation of the motor is too far.
        Parameters:

        signal -
        Returns:
        Signal without a deadband

      • applyDeadband

        public static double applyDeadband(double deadband,
                                   double signal)
        Introduces a deadband of a function given the signal. This is needed if the stick is "too touchy" and moves with slight bumps.
        Parameters:
        deadband -
        signal -
        Returns:
        New signal
